    Build a CV using autocv

Function reference

Preprocess resume data

Prepare the data before printing the resume.

Prepare

prepare_bio()
Prepare bio.
prepare_description_bullets()
Prepare entry descriptions.
prepare_links()
Prepare properly formatted links with custom text.
prepare_timeline()
Prepare dates.

Pipeline

preprocess_contacts()
Prepare contact info card.
preprocess_entries()
Run each resume data pre-processing step in sequence.
preprocess_text()
Prepare text blocks.

Utilities

append_skills_to_bullets()
Append a link field to a title field with custom text.
make_markdown_contacts() make_latex_contacts() make_txt_contacts()
Prepare individual entry in contact info card.
omit_hidden_fields()
Omit spreadsheet entries beginning with a preset prefix.
sort_skills()
Sort skills.

Build the resume

Print resume sections to the output file.

Build skill sections

build_skill_bars()
Construct a bar chart of skills.
build_skill_list()
Build skill list.
build_skill_table()
Build a two-column table of skills.

Build text sections

print_latex_section()
Print a section from a position dataframe to LaTeX.
print_section()
Print a section from a position dataframe to markdown.
print_txt_section()
Print sections of a plain text resume.
print_contact_info()
Print contact info.

Generate skill reports

Assess key words in your resume relative to a term bank or job posting.

Generate

count_terms()
Count keyword occurrences in a file based on a supplied list.
run_skill_count() check_skills()
Obtain keyword counts for a given document/term list and generate reports.
run_skill_report()
Generate a skill report for a given job application.

Utilities

download_webpage_txt() download_webpage_pdf()
Save the text from a webpage url.
match_pattern()
Check for term matches embedded in text.

Data handling

Helpers for finding and loading built-in template datasets.

autocv_resources()
Find the location of template data files on your system.
get_path_to()
Construct an absolute path to a project directory for saving and loading.

CLI

Command Line Interface helpers.

Interface

build_app_directory()
Create the file tree and data files for the present app.
get_app_info() get_path_to_app() open_app()
Access and open application files.
load_application_data()
Load application data (resume or cover letter).
render_all()
Run each resume/CV rendering option in sequence.
render_cv_as_html()
Build an informal HTML-format resume based on spreadsheet data.
render_cv_as_pdf()
Create a pdf export of a web-formatted resume based on spreadsheet data.
render_resume()
Build a LaTeX-rendered pdf of a resume based on spreadsheet data.
render_resume_plain()
Build an plain text resume based on spreadsheet data.

Helpers

construct_app_filepath()
Take an application config object and produce the target dir.
construct_app_metadata()
Create the metadata for a new application.
load_job_info()
Read user-defined metadata for the present job from a config file.
load_log()
Load the log for a given application period.
str_to_filename()
Convert a string to a valid file name.
validate_id()
Verify that matching job identifiers belong to the same job.
write_app_metadata()
Save the metadata for a new application.
write_log_entry()
Record the current application in the log for the present period.

On this page
